fields.comment: GAME_EFFECT
fields.name: effect

fields.comment: if 'effect' is set to 'CUSTOM', this will define effect uniqueness.
fields.name: custom_effect_id

fields.comment: how many frames does it affect -1 = forever
fields.name: frames

fields.comment: if > 0, previous game effects with the same exclusivity group as new one will be removed when calling LoadGameEffectEntityTo
fields.name: exclusivity_group

fields.comment: to disable the block message that rises
fields.name: report_block_msg

fields.comment: if set, will disable movement
fields.name: disable_movement

fields.comment: if set, will use this for ragdoll effect
fields.name: ragdoll_effect

fields.comment: converts to string name of the material that ragdoll is made out of
fields.name: ragdoll_material

fields.comment: an entity that is loaded to each ragdoll part if 'ragdoll_effect' is set to 'CUSTOM_RAGDOLL_ENTITY'
fields.name: ragdoll_effect_custom_entity_file

fields.comment: if 1, 'ragdoll_effect_custom_entity_file' is loaded only to the largest piece in the ragdoll
fields.name: ragdoll_fx_custom_entity_apply_only_to_largest_body

fields.comment: when doing a polymorph, this is what we convert it to
fields.name: polymorph_target

fields.comment: polymorph stores the serialized entity here...
fields.name: mSerializedData

fields.comment: Contains a handle to the caster of this GameEffect
fields.name: mCaster

fields.comment: Contains the herd if of the caster of this GameEffect
fields.name: mCasterHerdId

fields.comment: How likely is it that we teleport, larger = less often
fields.name: teleportation_probability

fields.comment: Never teleports more often that this
fields.name: teleportation_delay_min_frames

fields.comment: How many times has this GameEffectComponent teleported the owner?
fields.name: teleportations_num

fields.comment: If current hp is less than this, we store it here. Then we make sure the hp never exceeds this.
fields.name: no_heal_max_hp_cap

fields.comment: Status effect that caused this game effect, if any
fields.name: causing_status_effect

fields.comment: Did this effect occur because someone ate something?
fields.name: caused_by_ingestion_status_effect

fields.comment: was this caused by stains
fields.name: caused_by_stains

fields.comment: When charmed, will try to disable CameraBound. This keeps track if we've done it, so we can enable it back
fields.name: mCharmDisabledCameraBound

fields.comment: When charmed, will try to enable teleporting (tag:teleportable_NOT). This keeps track if we've done it, so we can disable it again
fields.name: mCharmEnabledTeleporting

fields.comment: Are we invisible?
fields.name: mInvisible

fields.comment: Counts stuff
fields.name: mCounter

fields.comment: Counts cooldown
fields.name: mCooldown

fields.comment: If 1, this is an effect extension and shouldn't create an extension when removed
fields.name: mIsExtension

fields.comment: NOTE( Petri ): 29.4.2024 - this is used internally to make RESPAWN perk disabled in the UI
fields.name: mIsSpent
